nodes.documentation:
@dev This fucntion allows for ownership transfer
@param newOwner is the address for the new owner
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev This fuction allows the owner to map the tellor uint data status code to the standarized 
ADO int status code such as null, retreived etc...
_tellorStatus uint the tellor status
_status the data ADO standarized int status
nodes.name: defineTellorCodeToStatusCode

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows owner to map the standarized bytes32 Id to a specific requestID from Tellor
The dev should ensure the _requestId exists otherwise request the data on Tellor to get a requestId
_requestID is the existing Tellor RequestID 
_id is the descption of the ID in bytes
nodes.name: defineTellorIdToBytesID
getTellorStatusFromStatus
getStatusFromTellorStatus
getTellorIdFromBytes
getBytesFromTellorID

nodes.documentation:
@dev This fucntion allows for ownership transfer
@param newOwner is the address for the new owner
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows owner to map the standarized bytes32 Id to a specific requestID from Tellor
The dev should ensure the _requestId exists otherwise request the data on Tellor to get a requestId
_requestID is the existing Tellor RequestID

nodes.name: defineTellorIdToBytesID
getTellorStatusFromStatus

defineTellorCodeToStatusCode(uint256,int.details: This fuction allows the owner to map the tellor uint data status code to the standarized  ADO int status code such as null, retreived etc... _tellorStatus uint the tellor status _status the data ADO standarized int status

defineTellorIdToBytesID(uint256,bytes32).details: Allows owner to map the standarized bytes32 Id to a specific requestID from Tellor The dev should ensure the _requestId exists otherwise request the data on Tellor to get a requestId _requestID is the existing Tellor RequestID  _id is the descption of the ID in bytes

getBytesFromTellorID(uint256).details: Getter function of the bytes32 ADO standaraized _id based on the specified Tellor RequestID
getBytesFromTellorID(uint256).return: _id is the bytes32 descriptor mapped to an existing Tellor's requestId

getStatusFromTellorStatus(uint256).details: Getter function of the int ADO standarized status code from the specified Tellor uint status

getTellorIdFromBytes(bytes32).details: Getter function of the Tellor RequestID based on the specified bytes32 ADO standaraized _id

params._id: is the bytes32 descriptor mapped to an existing Tellor's requestId

getTellorStatusFromStatus(int256).details: Getter function for the uint Tellor status code from the specified int ADO standarized status code

transferOwnership(address).details: This fucntion allows for ownership transfer

params.newOwner: is the address for the new owner
